top_comments.comment: Hello, kuwaiti here. Lived my entire life in kuwait. Nothing worse than going to work while forced to park your car under no shade in this heat. By the time work is done, the inside of the car temperature reaches 60c and no amount of AC helps. Imagine almost every single day getting cooked alive like that. Its inhumane. I despise the idea of leaving home no matter how boring it gets.

comments_since_last_sample.body: She is an influencwr most likely with a maid. We should replenish earth.

The Green revolution is very Important for the entire World and Planet.
What is happening in Kuwait is really amazing great and amazing.
Scary stuff! The little oasis Ms. Om Naief created is very inspiring. In small ways, individually, we can make a difference.
The Sun shine🌞 to bright and to hot🌡️.You got a heatwave.
